import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { NewAppContext } from "../../App"; import useAuth from "../../hooks/useAuth"; export default function UserList() { const { userList, setUserList } = useContext(NewAppContext); const [userList2, setUserList2] = useState([]); const { userInfo } = useAuth(); useEffect(() => { //https://dmf-server.vercel.app/ fetch(`https://dmf-server.vercel.app/users`) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => { // setUserList(data); setUserList2(data); }); }, []); console.log("first", userList); // searching method const handleSearch = (event) => { const searchText = event.target.value; if (searchText) { const matchedDetails = userList.filter( (details) => details.dmfID.includes(searchText) || details.transactionID.includes(searchText) ); setUserList(matchedDetails); } else { setUserList(userList2); } }; return (

); }
